content.question: Based on the painting, Maes most likely held which of the following views?

choices.label: Womenâ€™s labor should be restricted according to traditional guild practices.
Women were capable of managing the new financial practices.
Women should have property rights and equal legal status within marriage.
Women should be allowed to hold political office as members of the Dutch parliament.

content.answer: Women were capable of managing the new financial practices.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
